goal.en: This introductory course to research methods in education has four main objectives: (1) to familiarize students with a number of common research methods in education and their philosophical foundations, including quantitative research, qualitative research, action research, and mixed-method research; (2) for students to come to understand and use the steps of research design and the methods of data analysis through practice; (3) for students to use writing to learn the basic formats and rules of writing for educational research projects; (4) to guide students towards understanding and complying with a code of ethics in academic research.
goal.ch: 本課程為研究方法之概論課程，課程主要目標有四。第一，幫助同學認識教育領域當中常見的幾種研究方法及其哲學基礎，包含量化研究、質性研究、行動研究及混合研究等。第二、藉由練習，幫助同學理解並能操作研究設計之步驟及資料分析方法。第三，藉由實際撰寫，幫助同學理解教育研究計畫在書寫上的基本格式及規範。第四，培養同學理解並遵守研究相關之倫理守則。

grading.en: * Class participation (10％): This includes attendance and participation in class discussion. Students may use mobile phones, tablets, and laptops in class to search for information. N. B. During the Covid-19 pandemic, students are advised to take the day off and stay at home if they feel unwell or have a fever. This will not affect their attendance score. Students should wash or disinfect their hands before and after class. * Mid-term examination (40％): The exam is scheduled for April 19, 2021. Make-up exams will not be scheduled except for legitimate reasons. Students who miss or cheat in the exam will receive a grade of zero. The exam will cover the contents in the first half of the semester and will feature multiple choice, short answers, and essays. * Oral report (20％): Students will be put into groups to work on oral reports in the last two weeks of the course. The reports will be based on be students’ proposed research projects on educational issues of their choice and shall include exposition of the research question, literature review, research methods, and proposed methods of implementation. * Written report (30％): While the content of the written report is identical to that of the oral report, written reports should follow prescribed academic writing formats. In addition, at the end of the report students should describe their individual contribution to the report and course feedback.
grading.ch: 學期總成績將反映同學在整個學期的表現，因此老師不會進行成績調整，請同學努力唸書及完成報告。這門課將有小組報告，小組報告需要大家同心協力，過程中同學須多溝通協調，請每位同學付出一定的貢獻，勿當冗員。 課程的評分方式如下： *課堂參與(10％)：包含課堂出席、上課發問及討論，以及回答問題的表現等。課程進行時，你可以自由使用手機、平板電腦或是筆電，進行各類資料的查詢。課前請同學先用早餐，課堂進行時請勿吃東西。 *期中考試(40％)：期中考試訂於2024/04/26，若無特殊理由不得補考。缺考或考試中任何舞弊情事均以零分計。考試範圍為學期前半之上課內容。題型包含選擇題、簡答題及申論題。 *口頭報告(20％)：口頭報告將會在課程的最後兩週進行，同學以小組為單位，向其他同學報告所關心的教育題議研究計畫，包含研究問題說明、文獻探討、預計採取何種研究方法，以及預計如何執行等項目。 *書面報告 (30％)：同學所準備的書面報告，在內容上與口頭報告相同，然而要遵守報告書寫的格式規範。同時，每位同學要在報告的最後，加入自己對報告的貢獻項目及課程感想。書面報告至少要達到15頁A4單倍行距的份量。
